game.elements

Class GameElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.elements.GameElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Border, Buttons, GameElementMovable

    public abstract class GameElement
extends java.lang.Object
    Contem as caracteristicas básicas de um elemento do jogo.
    Author:
    Eduardo Tonatto e Everton de Assis.
